book.title: Adrift in The City or Oliver Conrad's Plucky Fight
book.description: 简介： The speaker, a boy of sixteen, stood on the lawn before a handsome country mansion. He had a bat in his hand, and had sent the ball far down the street. He was fashionably dressed, and evidently felt himself a personage of no small consequence....
